title: txpool_content method handler crashed
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: `erigon version 2021.07.3-alpha`

OS & Version: Ubuntu 18.04

Network: Rinkeby

#### Expected behaviour
txpool_content returns success result

#### Actual behaviour
returns jsonrpc error with text: "method handler crashed"
in logs stacktrace:
